definition: to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia

sentences.english: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me.
sentences.chinese: 骄傲人为我暗设网罗和绳索。

sentences.english: Among all the bridges, the most popular among tourists are the hanging bridges.
sentences.chinese: 在所有的桥中，最受旅游者欢迎的就是绳索吊桥。

sentences.english: Using the rope as a slide, Chien-Po helped the Emperor to safety.
sentences.chinese: 他们永绳索做了一个滑梯，把皇帝救到安全的地方。

sentences.english: The curriculum includes a lesson from the firemen on how to rappel from a building.
sentences.chinese: 其中的课程包括消防员教授如何用绳索从大楼上下来。

sentences.english: Dry-treated - Ropes that have been coated with or immersed in a water-repellent chemical.
sentences.chinese: 外层涂抹或浸入一种防水化学物质的绳索。

sentences.english: Bouldering is a type of free climbing without any ropes.
sentences.chinese: 抱石是一种没有任何绳索保护的攀岩运动。

sentences.english: Then he wanted to escape from there but tripped over a coil of rope.
sentences.chinese: 然后他想逃离那里但被一卷绳索绊倒了。

sentences.english: This procedure deals with working at heights and rope access.
sentences.chinese: 本程序主要讲述高空作业和绳索的使用。

sentences.english: The rope dangled in the breeze.
The ropes were glued into some brass tubing to keep the deadeyes even.
sentences.chinese: 在绳索被粘进黄铜管以均衡保持三眼滑轮。

sentences.english: You will be provided with a caving helmet, head lamp and ropes as required.
sentences.chinese: 您将获得探险所需的头盔，头灯和绳索。

sentences.english: They tied their prisoner up with a piece of rope.
sentences.chinese: 他们用绳索把犯人捆起来。

sentences.english: This leads to cords of attachment rebounding into the fields of those remaining behind.
sentences.chinese: 这导致连结的绳索回弹入那些活着的人的能量场。

sentences.english: Apollo 11's lunar module onto the Sea of Tranquillity, and promptly fluffed his lines.
sentences.chinese: 号的登月舱，到达静海，并迅速抖开绳索。

sentences.english: They also use ropes and special equipment.
sentences.chinese: 他们还需要绳索和特种装备。

sentences.english: Canopy and walls covered or enclosed by a blanket, with a fixed rope.
sentences.chinese: 帐顶及四壁覆盖或围以毛毡，用绳索固定。

definition: rope tackle hanging from a mast/crow foot (system of ropes through tackle to hold up an awning)
iron hook at the end a long pole
